content:
Intent Id: BAp901
Intent Name: Book_Appointment
Intent description: Make a reservation with a doctor for a specific date and time.  
Slots:
Slot Id: 321Q
SlotName: Information required
possibleValues:
	· Patient's name, 
	· preferred date and time of the visit, 
	· insurance information.
	· Doctor's name
Slot Id: 678R
SlotName: Methods
possibleValues:
	· Email
	· Phone call
	· In-person


Intent Id: MAp902
Intent Name: Modify_Appointment
Intent description: Change the date or time of an existing appointment.
Slots:
Slot Id: 234W
SlotName: Information required
possibleValues:
	· Patient's name, 
	· Scheduled date and time of the visit,
	· preferred date and time of the visit, 
Slot Id: 981H
SlotName: Methods
possibleValues:
	· Phone call
	· In-person


Intent Id: CAp903
Intent Name:  Cancel_Appointment
Intent description: Remove a scheduled appointment.
Slots:
Slot Id: 788B
SlotName: Information required
possibleValues:
	· Patient's name
	· Scheduled date and time of the visit
	· Doctor's name
Slot Id: 323F
SlotName: Methods
possibleValues:
	· Email
	· Phone call
	· In-person
	· Text/sms


Intent Id: CAp904
Intent Name: Confirm_Appointment
Intent description:Get confirmation of an appointment made by the patient.
Slots:
Slot Id: 254H
SlotName: Information required
possibleValues:
	· Patient's name, 
	· Scheduled date and time of the visit,
	· Doctor's name
Slot Id: 997H
SlotName: Methods
possibleValues:
	· Email
	· Phone call
	· In-person
	· Text/sms

# Instructions:
You are provided with the utterance and the intents. Intents have Intent Ids, name and intent description.  Intent Ids always start with 2 upper case letters, 1 lower case letter, 3 numbers. For each intent there are also slots associated with them.  Slot Id contains 3 numbers and 1 upper case letter.  It may also include a field possibleValues which means the slot must match one of the provided values.

I ask you to assign a relevant intent to the utterance. When making the decision also extract slots that associated with this intent.  If multiple slots are provided in the list above, fill only slots  that are present in the utterance.  If a slot is not provided, set the value of the slot to "none".

Give your final output as a JSON.  Be sure to include a key “prediction”.  The value of “prediction” should be a dictionary where the key of this dictionary is the intent id and the values is a sub-dictionary where the keys are the slot ids associated with the given intent and the values are the slot values. Be attentive and extract all values for each slot if multiple can be found in the utterance.
Attention: Do not extract any slots and their values if they were not given in the list provided above.   All possible slots keys should be present in the JSON for a given intent. If the output is not within this format, you will be heavily penalized. 

# Utterance:

"With this email I'm requesting the cancellation of my scheduled appointment with Dr. Anne Robin-Smith on December 12, 2021 at 11:35 am due to unforeseen circumstances.
I have encountered a sudden family emergency that requires my immediate attention and presence.  Unfortunately, I'm unable to keep appointment as planned. I deeply apologize for any inconvenience caused by this cancellation. I'm aware of the cancellation fee in the amount of $84 and will gladly pay them at my next visit of the clinic. 
Warm regards,
Taras Bulba"
